name: server
description: This project was bootstrapped with Fastify-CLI.

scripts.test: npm run build && tsc -p test/tsconfig.json && c8 node --test -r ts-node/register "test/**/*.ts"
scripts.start: npm run build && fastify start -p 3000 -l info dist/fastify/app.js | pino-pretty
scripts.debug: npm run build && fastify start -p 3000 -d -l info dist/fastify/app.js
